import React from "react"; function Result(props){ return(<> {/* Show the table with results if yearlyData is available */} {props.yearlyData.map((data) => ( ))}
Year Total Savings Interest (Year) Total Interest Invested capital
{data.year} {data.savingsEndOfYear} {data.yearlyInterest} {data.savingsEndOfYear-props.initial-data.yearlySavings*data.year} {props.initial + data.yearlySavings*data.year}
); } export default Result;
